objects.text:
• TARGETED RELIEF APPLICATION
• MULTIPLE THERAPEUTIC BLENDS
• FAST-ABSORBING FORMULA
• PORTABLE TRAVEL-FRIENDLY SIZE

product_details.name: Premium CBD Roll-On Collection: Your Natural Wellness Solution
product_details.description:
• Convenient roll-on applicator for targeted, mess-free application
• Available in multiple therapeutic formulations
• Made with high-quality CBD extract for maximum effectiveness
• Portable size perfect for on-the-go relief
• Fast-absorbing formula for quick results
• Natural ingredients for safe, daily use
• Easy-to-use packaging design
• Long-lasting effects for sustained relief
• Travel-friendly size fits in any purse or pocket
• Different varieties to address various wellness needs

banner_details:
The banner is split into four equal quadrants with a clean, modern design focusing on a wellness product. The top-left quadrant features bold, stacked text layers ("heading_1", "heading_2", and "heading_3") with a supporting tagline ("tagline"), all overlaying a subtle, semi-transparent circular graphic. Adjacent to this, the top-right quadrant showcases a photo of two hands interacting with product vials, adding a lifestyle touch to the design ("product_image"). The bottom-left quadrant presents a bullet-point list ("description") detailing product benefits, a large price point ("price"), and a call-to-action button composed of a rectangular shape ("cta_background") with centered text ("cta"). The bottom-right quadrant emphasizes urgency with a large circular graphic and a bold promotional statement ("offer_text"), complemented by abstract iconography adding visual interest. 

**Color Palette**:
- Forest Green (#2E8B57)
- Deep Teal (#1E5945)
- Medium Sea Green (#3A9D74)
- Beige (#F5F5DC)
- White (#FFFFFF)

Overall, the banner uses minimal typography with a strong hierarchical layout, balancing promotional content and visual elements.
product_color: The product image features a balanced, soothing color palette ideal for wellness-themed branding. Dominant hues include soft lavender (#A88ED1) from the lavender essential oil, calming teal (#8ECAC5) on the CBD bottle, and a refreshing sage green (#C3D9AD) from the eucalyptus-infused product. These colors are blended gently with gradients and complemented by the clean black caps (#1B1B1B) that add structure and contrast. The hand tones offer a natural, warm backdrop (#D6BDAF), enhancing the organic theme. For an advertisement banner, use these hues to evoke a sense of calm, wellness, and trust while maintaining vibrant, earthy appeal for visual harmony.
